# vscode的koro1FileHeader使用方法

```json
{
    //此为头部注释
    "fileheader.customMade": {
    "Description": "",
    "Version": "",
    "Autor": "copy",
    "Date": "Do not edit",
    "LastEditors": "copy",
    "LastEditTime": "Do not edit"
  },
  //此为函数注释
  "fileheader.cursorMode": {
    "description": "",
    "param": "",
    "return": "",
    "author": "copy"
  },
  "fileheader.configObj": {
    "autoAdd": true, // 自动添加头部注释开启才能自动添加
    "autoAlready": true, // 默认开启
    
  },
 
}
```

* `ctrl+win+i`头文件
* `ctrl+win+j`召唤圣兽
* `ctrl+win+t`函数
